description: Far too often we read about websites that have "leaked" millions of passwords or email addresses (or both). Even if the passwords are hashed this is of course bad - and email addresses can be valuable. This video will outline a trivial way to use the security features in PostgreSQL to make this type of attack significantly harder, without compromising site functionality.
